Operation 'getSubstanceStructures' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, inconsistent_terminology. Current description is too minimal. Added clarity about what is returned (dataset with structural and component information), the input (substance UUID), and the use case. Improved consistency with API domain terminology (substances, composition, structures).

data.current_summary: Get substance composition as a dataset
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the chemical structures and composition data for a specified substance. Returns a dataset containing structural information and component details associated with the substance UUID. Useful for understanding the composition of chemical substances and nanomaterials.
data.reasoning: Current description is too minimal. Added clarity about what is returned (dataset with structural and component information), the input (substance UUID), and the use case. Improved consistency with API domain terminology (substances, composition, structures).

message: Operation 'getSubstanceStudySummary' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original description lacks essential details. Added information about what data is aggregated, the return type (SubstanceStudySummary), and that filtering/pagination are supported. This helps AI agents understand the operation's scope and capabilities.

data.current_summary: Get study summary for the substance
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves an aggregated summary of all studies and measurements associated with a specified substance. Returns a SubstanceStudySummary object containing study counts, endpoints, and measurement data. Supports filtering and pagination through query parameters.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks essential details. Added information about what data is aggregated, the return type (SubstanceStudySummary), and that filtering/pagination are supported. This helps AI agents understand the operation's scope and capabilities.

message: Operation 'getEndpointSummary' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_output_details. Original summary and description are too vague and don't clarify what 'endpoint' means in this context. Improved by specifying this returns study endpoint statistics (faceted data), clarifying the return type, and explaining the use case for AI agents.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a faceted summary of study endpoints across the database. Returns aggregated counts and statistics for different measurement endpoints and study types. Useful for understanding the distribution of available study data and measurement categories.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are too vague and don't clarify what 'endpoint' means in this context. Improved by specifying this returns study endpoint statistics (faceted data), clarifying the return type, and explaining the use case for AI agents.

message: Operation 'searchByIdentifier' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Current description is incomplete. Added clarity about input parameters (identifier term and representation format), the search method (exact match), and what is returned (list of compounds with structural data). This helps AI agents understand the search mechanism and expected results.

data.description_suggestion: Searches for chemical compounds using an exact structure identifier match. Accepts a chemical identifier term and its representation format (e.g., SMILES, InChI, CAS number). Returns a list of matching compounds with their structural data and associated substance information.
data.reasoning: Current description is incomplete. Added clarity about input parameters (identifier term and representation format), the search method (exact match), and what is returned (list of compounds with structural data). This helps AI agents understand the search mechanism and expected results.

message: Operation 'searchBySimilarity' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is contradictory ('exact' vs 'similarity'). Description lacks input details (threshold parameters) and output details (ranking by similarity score). Improved version clarifies the search method, input parameters, and result ranking to help AI agents understand when to use this operation and how to interpret results.

data.description_suggestion: Searches for chemical compounds with structural similarity to a query structure. Accepts a reference compound identifier and similarity threshold parameters. Returns a ranked list of compounds sorted by similarity score, enabling identification of structurally related substances and materials.
data.reasoning: Original summary is contradictory ('exact' vs 'similarity'). Description lacks input details (threshold parameters) and output details (ranking by similarity score). Improved version clarifies the search method, input parameters, and result ranking to help AI agents understand when to use this operation and how to interpret results.

message: Operation 'solrquery_get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary 'Apache Solr powered search' is too technical and vague about the actual search capability. Description references external documentation but lacks clarity on what the operation returns and its practical use. Improved version emphasizes federated search capability, clarifies input/output, and explains GET method limitations for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: This search is powered by [Apache Solr](https://solr.apache.org/) and accepts the standard Solr query syntax. If you need more information on the parameters and how to use them, check [this guide](https://solr.apache.org/guide/8_8/common-query-parameters.html). To better understand how to construct the queries, see also the schemas below. Both `GET` and `POST` are supported, with `GET` being simpler to use, but with restrictions on the complexity and the lenght of the parameters.
data.summary_suggestion: Execute free text search across federated databases
data.description_suggestion: Executes a free text search query across all selected project databases using Apache Solr syntax. Accepts standard Solr query parameters for filtering and faceting. GET method is simpler but limited to less complex queries due to URL length restrictions. Returns aggregated search results from multiple databases in Solr response format. Supports pagination and result limiting via parameters.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'Apache Solr powered search' is too technical and vague about the actual search capability. Description references external documentation but lacks clarity on what the operation returns and its practical use. Improved version emphasizes federated search capability, clarifies input/output, and explains GET method limitations for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'solrquery_post' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary and description are extremely vague and lack actionable information. Description has typo ('much for' should be 'much more') and doesn't explain what the operation does or returns. Improved version clarifies POST method advantages, explains input/output, and helps AI agents understand when to use POST vs GET.

data.current_description: POST is more complex to use, but also allows for much for complex and lengthy queries.
data.summary_suggestion: Execute complex federated search with POST
data.description_suggestion: Executes a free text search query across all selected project databases using Apache Solr syntax via POST method. Supports complex and lengthy queries without URL length restrictions. Accepts Solr query parameters in request body for advanced filtering, faceting, and aggregation. Returns aggregated search results from multiple databases in Solr response format. Preferred for complex query construction and large parameter sets.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are extremely vague and lack actionable information. Description has typo ('much for' should be 'much more') and doesn't explain what the operation does or returns. Improved version clarifies POST method advantages, explains input/output, and helps AI agents understand when to use POST vs GET.

message: Operation 'getInvestigationResults' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Original summary and description are too vague and lack domain context. 'Details of multiple studies' and 'Multiple studies in tabular form' don't explain what data is returned or how to use it. Improved version clarifies that this retrieves study/investigation data, explains the tabular format purpose, and adds context about filtering and aggregation for better AI agent understanding.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve study measurements in tabular format
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed study data (measurements or calculations) for a substance in tabular form. Returns investigation results including study parameters, endpoints, and values organized by study. Supports filtering by database, substance criteria, and study parameters. Results are aggregated from the specified database and formatted for data analysis and comparison.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are too vague and lack domain context. 'Details of multiple studies' and 'Multiple studies in tabular form' don't explain what data is returned or how to use it. Improved version clarifies that this retrieves study/investigation data, explains the tabular format purpose, and adds context about filtering and aggregation for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'getSubstances' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary 'List substances' is too generic and doesn't indicate search capability. Description lacks detail about search parameters, filtering options, and what metadata is returned. Improved version clarifies search and filtering capabilities, explains return data structure, and emphasizes the discovery use case for AI agents.

data.current_description: Returns a list of substances, according to the search criteria
data.summary_suggestion: Search and retrieve substances by criteria
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of chemical substances and nanomaterials matching the specified search criteria. Supports free text search, faceted filtering by properties, and pagination. Returns substance metadata including identifiers, names, and composition information. Results are aggregated from the specified database. Useful for discovering substances matching specific characteristics or properties.
data.reasoning: Original summary 'List substances' is too generic and doesn't indicate search capability. Description lacks detail about search parameters, filtering options, and what metadata is returned. Improved version clarifies search and filtering capabilities, explains return data structure, and emphasizes the discovery use case for AI agents.

message: Operation 'getSubstanceByUUID' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details. Original summary and description are extremely vague and lack specificity. 'Get a substance' and 'Returns substance representation' don't explain what data is included or how to use the UUID parameter. data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve detailed substance information by UUID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves complete substance representation including chemical properties, composition, identifiers, and associated metadata for a specific substance identified by UUID. Returns detailed substance object with all available information from the specified database. Use this operation when you have a substance UUID and need full substance details.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are extremely vague and lack specificity. 'Get a substance' and 'Returns substance representation' don't explain what data is included or how to use the UUID parameter. message: Operation 'getSubstanceStudy' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details. Original summary has inconsistent capitalization and is vague. Description 'Returns substance study representation' lacks clarity about what study data is included and the operation's purpose. Improved version clarifies the substance-study relationship, explains what study data is returned, and provides domain context about use cases (toxicity, property analysis).

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve studies and measurements for a substance
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all studies (measurements and calculations) associated with a specific substance identified by UUID. Returns study data including endpoints, test conditions, results, and metadata. Supports filtering by study parameters and pagination. Useful for accessing experimental or computational data linked to a substance for toxicity assessment or property analysis.
data.reasoning: Original summary has inconsistent capitalization and is vague. Description 'Returns substance study representation' lacks clarity about what study data is included and the operation's purpose. Improved version clarifies the substance-study relationship, explains what study data is returned, and provides domain context about use cases (toxicity, property analysis).

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve chemical composition of a substance
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the chemical composition details for a specific substance identified by UUID. Returns component information including chemical structures, identifiers, and composition percentages or ratios. Useful for understanding the constituent parts of complex substances, nanomaterials, or formulations. Supports filtering by composition parameters.
data.reasoning: Original summary and description are minimal and lack actionable information.
